name: Neverwinter Nights: Pirates of the Sword Coast
name_original: Neverwinter Nights: Pirates of the Sword Coast
description:
Neverwinter Nights: Pirates of the Sword Coast is a RPG game. It was originally released in 2005. The game is rated as "Skip" on RAWG.
Neverwinter Nights: Pirates of the Sword Coast is available on PC.
It was produced by Trent Oster. It was directed by Trent Oster. Jeremy Soule scored the game.
